data.title: Bashkir State Medical University
data.meta_description: About University   University Bashkir State Medical University is the centre of the Medical and Pharmaceutical science of the Bashkortostan. It is a leading university that has been training specialists for scientific, healthcare, and pedagogical work in the field of pharmaceutical education and professional medical education of the Russian Federation. BSMU was established in 1932 in UFA, Russian Federation, a beautiful city of Russia. The university provides preparatory courses, undergraduate degrees in general medicine, Pharmacy, and Dentistry) and post-graduate degree (Residency, Internship, and Ph.D. Fellowship) courses. Highlights of Bashkir State Medical University   Highly focused on scientific research. BSMU is a member of the World Health Organization (WHO) and is recognized by the Medical Council of India (MCI), GMC (UK), MMC (Malaysia), and other countries. Recently, more than 400 foreign students are studying from 28 other countries. There are 85 theoretical and clinical departments with 248 Doctors of Sciences, 610 MDs in this educational institution. Adopted simulation-based learning technologies in pre-clinical and clinical training. Affordable fees in comparison to other European Universities. The university has implemented a modern and hi-tech approach in the educational process and research. City About UFA is the capital city of the Republic of Bashkortostan, Russia. It is an economic, scientific, cultural, and industrial centre of the republic.  As per the Index of Forbes, UFA is the best place in Russia for operating the business while the local economy comprises energy, fuel, and engineering complexes. UFA is located in Eastern Europe, shares its land boundary with Asia, and is on the confluence of the UFA and Belaya Rivers. It has a beautiful geographical scene with advanced architects. Transportation is developed and convenient from other states and countries. UFA is also the home city for “Salavat Yulayev” – the ice hockey club.  It is considered one of the best places to study in Russia for students. Indian students at Bashkir State Medical University Medical Degree at Bashkir State Medical University:  The medical degree of BSMU is worldwide accepted and recognized. It is licensed by the Ministry of Education of the Russian Federation to trained International students. The duration of the degree is of 6 years including 5 years of classroom theory and 1 year of internship. However, there is a strong focus on practical learning for the complete duration of the study. International Recognition:  BSMU is a member of the World Health Organization (WHO) and is recognized by the Medical Council of India (MCI), GMC (UK), MMC (Malaysia), and other countries. Doctors from BSMU are eligible for appearing in the Medical Screening test in India conducted by MCI and can start their practice globally. Low-Cost MBBS:  MBBS fees in Russia is very low in comparison to other European countries. There is no provision of donation fees also while the cost of living is very low. For complete fees details, please refer to the given below fees structure. Language:  Students can opt for the language either in Russian or English. While the medium of study in English for foreign students. About Hostel Bashkir State Medical University provides lodging to around 2000 students with fully furnished and comfortable rooms via their 5 hostels. The rooms are spacious with providing a central heating system like AC. Students can choose their accommodation as rooms are divided between 2,3 or 4 students. The basic facilities are inclusive of heated rooms, Gym, canteen, free internet access and 24 hours security. Co-curricular Activities:  Bashkir University comprises 20 different kinds of sports including the department of Soccer, volleyball, basketball, powerlifting, chess, mountain climbing classes, and so on. The staff and students can avail the opportunity of the summer camp that makes study cheerful and develops the intellectual abilities of students. MBBS Entrance Exams:  Students can take direct admission to MBBS in Russia without giving any entrance exams. Candidates can connect to Lakshya MBBS Overseas team for a hassle-free process. data.text:
Medical Degree at Bashkir State Medical University: The medical degree of BSMU is worldwide accepted and recognized. It is licensed by the Ministry of Education of the Russian Federation to trained International students. The duration of the degree is of 6 years including 5 years of classroom theory and 1 year of internship. However, there is a strong focus on practical learning for the complete duration of the study.

International Recognition: BSMU is a member of the World Health Organization (WHO) and is recognized by the Medical Council of India (MCI), GMC (UK), MMC (Malaysia), and other countries. Doctors from BSMU are eligible for appearing in the Medical Screening test in India conducted by MCI and can start their practice globally.

Low-Cost MBBS: MBBS fees in Russia is very low in comparison to other European countries. There is no provision of donation fees also while the cost of living is very low. For complete fees details, please refer to the given below fees structure.

Language: Students can opt for the language either in Russian or English. While the medium of study in English for foreign students.

Bashkir State Medical University provides lodging to around 2000 students with fully furnished and comfortable rooms via their 5 hostels. The rooms are spacious with providing a central heating system like AC. Students can choose their accommodation as rooms are divided between 2,3 or 4 students. The basic facilities are inclusive of heated rooms, Gym, canteen, free internet access and 24 hours security.

Co-curricular Activities: Bashkir University comprises 20 different kinds of sports including the department of Soccer, volleyball, basketball, powerlifting, chess, mountain climbing classes, and so on. The staff and students can avail the opportunity of the summer camp that makes study cheerful and develops the intellectual abilities of students.

MBBS Entrance Exams: Students can take direct admission to MBBS in Russia without giving any entrance exams. Candidates can connect to Lakshya MBBS Overseas team for a hassle-free process.
